name: Hexavity
description:
It is a platform game which you can change the direction of the gravity to reach to the BONE. Our main character 'kaiLa' is sent to the space for gravity science experience. 

You can use 'A' and 'D' to move, and 'Space' to jump. Press 1~6 to change the gravity direction to where you want or click the screen and drag it to the direction you desire.

*You have limited amount of Gravity Change to use. 

*If you touch spikes, you will DIE!!

Plz Enjoy!

PS. Only Korean is allowed for now. Wait for new UPDATES!!
